attributes.action: This petition calls for the creation of a Peerage for Nigel Farage MEP.
attributes.background: Nigel Farage MEP has, for twenty years, campaigned tirelessly to bring to fruition a Referendum on the UK's continued membership of the EU.  This Referendum having taken place, a suitable public honour should be awarded to recognise his contribution to the country and political discourse.

rejection.details:
In any case, non-party-political life peers are nominated by the House of Lords Appointments Commission, which is independent.

You can find out how members of the public can nominate people as life peers here:

http://lordsappointments.independent.gov.uk/frequently_asked_questions.aspx

We only reject petitions that don’t meet the petition standards.
